Items.Title: Application number C 200012 ZSM (213-227 West 28th Street Parking Special Permits) submitted by 215 West 28th Street Property Owner LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Sections 13-45 (Special Permits for additional parking spaces) and 13-451 (Additional parking spaces for residential growth)  of the Zoning Resolution to allow an automated accessory parking garage with a maximum capacity of 41 spaces on portions of the ground floor, cellar and sub-cellar levels 1, 2 and 3, of a proposed mixed-use building at 213-219 West 28th Street (Block 778, Lot 31), on a zoning lot located at 213-227 West 28th Street (Block 778, Lots 25 & 31), in an M1-6D District. Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 213-227 West 28th Street Parking Special Permits, Manhattan (C 200012 ZSM)

Items.Title: Application number C 200013 ZSM (213-227 West 28th Street Parking Special Permits) submitted by 225 West 28th Street Property Owner LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Sections 13-45 (Special Permits for additional parking spaces) and 13-451 (Additional parking spaces for residential growth) of the Zoning Resolution to allow an automated accessory parking garage with a maximum capacity of 36 spaces on portions of the ground floor, cellar and sub-cellar levels 1, 2 and 3, of a proposed mixed-use building at 221-227 West 28th Street (Block 778, Lot 25), on a zoning lot located at 213-227 West 28th Street (Block 778, Lots 25 & 31), in an M1-6D District. Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 213-227 West 28th Street Parking Special Permits, Manhattan (C 200013 ZSM)
